title: ShippingException
description: This object is used to set shipping exceptions for merchant SKUs

merchantSku.description: Your unique identifier for each product you sell on Jet

shippingCarrier.description: A shipping carrier, including all that carrier's ShippngMethods e.g. UPS, FedEx, USPS.  Use this field if you want your change to apply to all ShippingMethods of a given carrier.

shippingMethod.description: A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home

overrideType.description: The type of shipping override, "Additional Charge" or "Override Charge" (Override Charge could be used to lower shipping)

shippingChargeAmount.description: The amount added to default shipping when "OverrideType"= "additional charge" and the total amount charged when "OverrideType" =  "Override charge"

isShippingRestricted.description: Indicates whether the SKU can or cannot be shipped using the specified shipping service (ShippingCarrier or ShippingMethod). A value of "true" means that the SKU cannot be shipped using the specified shipping service.
